title: Natalie Imbruglia shares countryside snap with newborn son Max... as she promises fans new music
text:
She has been in new motherhood bliss for the past few weeks after welcoming her first son Max via IVF.

And on Sunday, Natalie Imbruglia, 44, shared a rare glimpse at her newborn as she bonded with him in a paddock next to a herd of sheep.

Taking to Instagram, the new mother uploaded a sweet photo of the idyllic moment, captioning the post: 'Me and my flock'.

'Me and my flock!' On Sunday, Natalie Imbruglia, 44, shared a rare glimpse at her newborn son Max as she bonded with him in a paddock next to a herd of sheep

'I just wanted to let you all know that Max and I are doing great and to say thank you so much for all the well wishes and generous gifts we have received, it’s been so heartwarming,' she continued.

'I'll be taking some bonding time with Max and look forward to releasing my new music in the new year! she added.

Natalie swathed her frame in a grey windbreaker, black leggings and a pair of black gumboots.

Supportive: The actress' celebrity friends were quick to comment underneath Nat's snap

She appeared to wear her newborn in a sling tied to the front of her body.

The singer's celebrity friends were quick to comment underneath the heartwarming snap.

Jessica Gomes and Kylie Minogue posted a series of heart emojis, while Ruby Rose wrote: 'Miss you Nat. X'

'Welcome to the world... Max Valentine Imbruglia. My heart is bursting #myboy,' she wrote at the time

Natalie welcomed her first child on October 9, writing on Instagram at the time: 'Welcome to the world... Max Valentine Imbruglia. My heart is bursting #myboy.'

Natalie announced she was pregnant with her first child in July, after undergoing in vitro fertilisation (IVF) with the help of a sperm donor.

The brunette refused to announce who the father was, she wrote: 'I won't be saying anything more on that publicly.
